name: BNNSOptimizerSGDMomentumWithClippingFields
desc: A structure that contains the fields of a stochastic gradient descent (SGD) with momentum optimizer that optionally clips the gradient by value or by norm.

items.name: init(learning_rate: Float, momentum: Float, gradient_scale: Float, regularization_scale: Float, nesterov: Bool, regularization_func: BNNSOptimizerRegularizationFunction, sgd_momentum_variant: BNNSOptimizerSGDMomentumVariant, clipping_func: BNNSOptimizerClippingFunction, clip_gradients_min: Float, clip_gradients_max: Float, clip_gradients_max_norm: Float, clip_gradients_use_norm: Float)
items.desc: Returns a new SGD with momentum optimizer fields structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new SGD with momentum optimizer fields structure.

items.name: var learning_rate: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the learning rate.

items.name: var gradient_scale: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the gradient scaling factor.

items.name: var regularization_scale: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the regularization scaling factor.

items.name: var nesterov: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to use Nesterov momentum update.

items.name: var regularization_func: BNNSOptimizerRegularizationFunction
items.desc: The variable that specifies the regularization function.

items.name: var sgd_momentum_variant: BNNSOptimizerSGDMomentumVariant
items.desc: The variable that specifies the momentum variant.

items.name: var clip_gradients_min: Float
items.desc: The minimum clipping value for clipping by value.

items.name: var clip_gradients_max: Float
items.desc: The maximum clipping value for clipping by value.

items.name: var clip_gradients_max_norm: Float
items.desc: The maximum Euclidean norm for clipping by norm and clipping by global norm.

items.name: var clip_gradients_use_norm: Float
items.desc: An optional value for a known Euclidean norm for clipping by global norm.
